item.title: CVE-2023-52150|2024-01-05T08:07:22.836Z -- ovation%20s.r.l. -- dynamic%20content%20for%20elementor
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Ovation S.R.L. Dynamic Content for Elementor.This issue affects Dynamic Content for Elementor: from n/a before 2.12.5.
